```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
mygitpath <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bklingen/DataViz2020_Maps/master/CoronaCases.csv'
corona <- read_csv(mygitpath)
library(maps)
library(dplyr)
library(mapproj)
```

```{r}
counties.cases <- corona %>% group_by(County) %>% tally() %>% mutate(County=tolower(County)) %>% drop_na()
```

```{r}
countydata <- map_data("county") %>% filter(region=="florida") %>% drop_na()
```

```{r}
wbmap <- left_join(counties.cases, countydata, by=c("County"="subregion"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(wbmap, aes(x=long, y=lat, group=group, fill=wbmap$n)) + 
  geom_polygon(color="black", size=0.5) + theme_minimal() + 
  coord_map(projection = "mercator", xlim=c(-90, -77), ylim=c(22, 33)) + 
  labs(title="COVID-19 Cases in Florida by County", fill="Number of Cases") + 
  scale_fill_viridis_c()
```
